attributes.action: Get the Environmental Agency to repair the mill gates at Townford Mill Halstead
attributes.background: The Environmental Agency's neglect of the mill gate at Townsford Mill has left the river low, overgrown and rat-infested, and the area looking derelict, depriving residents and visitors of the key amenity of the town

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Local authorities have powers to require clean up of land when its condition is adversely affecting the amenity of the local area. If it is a public health problem, such as a rat infestation, it is the responsibility of the environmental health team at the local authority to investigate and decide whether there was a need to take further action.
